# Question 5
## What are some successful examples of cities implementing effective climate action plans?

#### Title: Climate Change 2014 Synthesis Report Summary for Policymakers_Section: SPM 4. Adaptation and Mitigation (see here)[https://www.ipcc.ch/site/assets/uploads/2018/02/AR5_SYR_FINAL_SPM.pdf]

Following are the approaches for managing the risks of climate change through adaptation: ```Table SPM 3```

- Human development
- Ecosystem management
- Spatial or land-use planning
- Ecosystem based options 
- Solar energy
- urban green infrastructure
- energy efficiency
- demand-side management
- improved forest and crop/grassland management
- National & government policies & programs
- Land zoning laws and Building standards etc.
